ORDER_FORM.TITLE: Please enter contact information below to complete your order.

PRODUCTS.INTRO: You'll be proud of your photos! Together we'll create character, determine subject and find most suitable locations. During photo session you'll be provided with assistance on effective poses.
PRODUCTS.NOTES:
• Please note that If selected location is not free to visit, you should pay for it individually
  • If location is outside of Berlin, tickets are not included in package.

COMPONENT.SENDING_DATA_SUCCEED: Your order has been sent! We'll connect with you shortly
COMPONENT.SENDING_DATA_FAILED: Your order has not been sent. Please try again later or contact us directly! Thank you for your understanding!

PRODUCT.DESCRIPTION: During {{package.duration}} you will get {{package.photoAmount}} photos ({{yourChoice}} by photographer choice)
